title: Arcaea pack metadata
description: The metadatas of packs in Arcaea

songId.description: The id of the song needed to unlock specified in songlist file

ratingClass.description: The rating class of the difficulty that needs to be unlocked, 0 for past, 1 for present and 2 for future

conditions.description: The unlock conditions of the difficulty

type.description: The type of the unlock condition, 0 for fragments, 1 for grade on early charts, 101 for anomaly

credit.description: The fragments needed to unlock the song

song_id.description: The id of the song needed to clear specified in songlist file

song_difficulty.description: The rating class of the difficulty that needs to clear, 0 for past, 1 for present and 2 for future

grade.description: The require grade to the charts when cleared, 0 for no limit, 1 for C, 2 for B, 3 for A, 4 for AA, 5 for EX

min.description: The minimum progress when failed to unlock this song

max.description: The maximum progress when failed to unlock this song
